result.title: Evaluation of pilot project execution and results
result.description: D64 will summarize the pilots It will provide a comprehensive description of all activities in WP6 Results of the projects will be compared with the results planned in their proposals and contracts and reasons analysed for possible failures especially with regard to the ELG Dissemination activities will be listed to promote the results of the pilots Finally D64 will give recommendations for possible changes to the ELG maintainers in order to facilitate future projects using and for broader impact assessment of the pilot projects after a period of time

result.title: PT Case Study

result.title: DE Case Study
result.description: This deliverable will consist in the test and validation in the Railway track n 6185 linking Oebisfelde and BerlinSpandau Germany of the project outcomes in order to analyse the effects of stepwise rising water levels and to deliver a resilience scheme to be incorporated in the maintenance and upgrading plans of the infrastructure Task 62
